item.title: Could it be Tesco Mobile selling iPhone? or just Tesco Supermarkets
item.description: Sounds like good news in the UK market ‘opening’ up to more distribution channels for the iPhone. Tesco’s annouced it plans to start selling the iPhone by the end of the year and promised to add value to the market, where prices are stagnating between O2 and Orange. What this means is that Tesco will be just another distributor like the Carphone Warehouse â€” and so at first, it didn’t seem clear if customers will have a choice of O2 or Orange.
